defaultBenefits.name: $300 Annual Travel Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Automatically applied to travel purchases. Resets annually on card anniversary.

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $300 travel credit before it resets!

defaultBenefits.name: Priority Pass Select Membership
defaultBenefits.description: Complimentary access to 1,300+ airport lounges worldwide

reminder.message: Activate your Priority Pass membership to access airport lounges

defaultBenefits.name: Global Entry / TSA PreCheck Credit
defaultBenefits.description: $100 credit every 4 years for Global Entry or TSA PreCheck application fee

reminder.message: You may be eligible for a Global Entry/TSA PreCheck credit renewal

defaultBenefits.name: DoorDash Credit
defaultBenefits.description: $5 monthly DoorDash credit (DashPass membership required)

reminder.message: Use your $5 DoorDash credit this month!

defaultBenefits.name: Uber Cash Credit
defaultBenefits.description: $15 monthly Uber credit ($35 in December)

reminder.message: Use your $15 Uber credit this month! ($35 in December)

defaultBenefits.name: Airline Fee Credit
defaultBenefits.description: $200 annual credit for airline incidental fees with selected airline

reminder.message: Don't forget to use your $200 airline fee credit!

defaultBenefits.name: Saks Fifth Avenue Credit
defaultBenefits.description: $50 credit every 6 months (January-June and July-December)

reminder.message: Use your $50 Saks credit for this half of the year!

defaultBenefits.name: 5% Quarterly Bonus Categories
defaultBenefits.description: Earn 5% cash back on rotating categories (up to $1,500 per quarter)

reminder.message: Check this quarter's 5% bonus categories and activate them!

defaultBenefits.name: Amazon Rewards on Amazon.com
defaultBenefits.description: Earn rewards on eligible Amazon.com purchases (reward rates vary by Prime membership and offers).

reminder.message: Review your Amazon Store Card rewards and redeem if you'd like.

defaultBenefits.name: Special Financing Offers
defaultBenefits.description: Access promotional financing on eligible Amazon purchases when available (terms vary by offer).

reminder.message: If you used special financing, double-check the payoff deadline to avoid interest.

defaultBenefits.name: Uber Cash Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Monthly Uber Cash credit (amount varies by product/version).

reminder.message: Use your Amex Gold Uber Cash credit this month.

defaultBenefits.name: Dining Credit
defaultBenefits.description: Monthly dining credit at participating merchants (enrollment/terms may apply).

reminder.message: Use your Amex Gold dining credit this month.

predefinedCards.name: Delta SkyMiles Gold American Express Card

defaultBenefits.name: First Checked Bag Free (Delta)
defaultBenefits.description: Get your first checked bag free on Delta flights for eligible travelers on the reservation (terms apply).

reminder.message: Remember your Delta Gold perks (like free checked bag) when booking Delta flights.

defaultBenefits.name: Priority Boarding (Delta)
defaultBenefits.description: Enjoy earlier boarding on Delta flights (terms apply).

reminder.message: Use your Delta Gold priority boarding benefit on your next Delta trip.

defaultBenefits.name: Earn Points on Rent
defaultBenefits.description: Earn points on rent payments (restrictions and terms apply; requires setup in the Bilt app).

reminder.message: Pay rent via Bilt and confirm your account is linked to earn points.

defaultBenefits.name: Rent Day Promotions
defaultBenefits.description: Rent Day (typically the 1st of each month) may include bonus earning and special promotions (varies).

reminder.message: It's Rent Dayâ€”check Bilt for any bonus earning or special promos.

predefinedCards.name: Bank of America Customized Cash Rewards

defaultBenefits.name: 3% Choice Category Cash Back
defaultBenefits.description: Earn elevated cash back in a category you choose (selection and rates vary; terms apply).

reminder.message: Confirm your 3% choice category for this month (if you plan to change it).

defaultBenefits.name: Quarterly Bonus Cap
defaultBenefits.description: The elevated 3%/2% categories are typically capped per quarter (terms apply).

reminder.message: Track progress toward your quarterly cap for bonus cash back categories.

defaultBenefits.name: 5% Rotating Categories
defaultBenefits.description: Earn 5% cash back in rotating categories after activation (up to the quarterly cap; terms apply).

reminder.message: Activate Discover's 5% categories and plan spend for this quarter.

defaultBenefits.name: Crate & Barrel Rewards
defaultBenefits.description: Earn rewards on eligible Crate & Barrel family of brands purchases (rates/terms vary).

reminder.message: Check your Crate & Barrel rewards balance and redeem before any expiration.

defaultBenefits.name: Cardholder Offers
defaultBenefits.description: Receive cardholder-only offers and potential special financing promotions when available (terms vary).

reminder.message: If you used a Crate & Barrel promo/financing offer, confirm its payoff deadline.

defaultBenefits.name: Promotional Financing Offers
defaultBenefits.description: No interest if paid in full within the promotional period on eligible purchases (terms and minimums vary).

reminder.message: If you used PayPal Credit promo financing, review the promo end date and payoff progress.

defaultBenefits.name: REI Rewards on Eligible Purchases
defaultBenefits.description: Earn rewards on eligible purchases, including at REI and in everyday categories (rates/terms vary).

reminder.message: Review your REI rewards and redeem them toward gear if you want.

defaultBenefits.name: No Foreign Transaction Fees
defaultBenefits.description: Avoid foreign transaction fees on eligible international purchases (terms apply).

reminder.message: Traveling soon? Remember your REI Mastercard typically has no foreign transaction fees.
